basicInfoDesc: Basic information of this AWS account
connectionTips: The connection may takes around 20-30 seconds.
connectToDataSourceForAccount: Connect to data source for account Id:
connectToDataSourceForAccountDesc: You can create data catalogs by connecting data source.

header.s3Info: The S3 buckets that are discovered in this account. Connect to S3 buckets to create data catalogs.
header.rdsInfo: The RDS instances that are discovered in this account. Connect to RDS instances to create data catalogs.
header.jdbcInfo: The JDBC connections that are discovered in this account. Connect to JDBC connection to create data catalogs.
header.glueInfo: The Glue databases that are discovered in this account.
